title: Tornadoes
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 564 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 920L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and P
description: Have you ever experienced a tornado? What would you do if you were in a tornado? Tornadoes provides students a comprehensive look at this amazing force. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause and effect relationships and the inflectional ending -ing. The book and lesson are also available for levels J and P.
meta: atmosphere, damage, funnel, moist, strike, tornadoes
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Cause and Effect : Determine cause-and-effect relationships

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
